00037 #include "egs_point_source.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 EGS_PointSource::EGS_PointSource(EGS_Input *input, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00041     EGS_BaseSimpleSource(input,f), xo(), valid(true) {
00042     vector<EGS_Float> pos;
00043     int err = input->getInput("position",pos);
00044     if( !err && pos.size() == 3 ) xo = EGS_Vector(pos[0],pos[1],pos[2]);
00045     else {
00046         egsWarning("EGS_PointSource: missing/wrong 'position' input\n");
00047         valid = false;
00048     }
00049     setUp();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void EGS_PointSource::setUp() {
00053     otype = "EGS_PointSource";
00054     if( !isValid() ) description = "Invalid point source";
00055     else {
00056         description = "Point source with ";
00057         description += s->getType();
00058         if( q == -1 ) description += ", electrons";
00059         else if( q == 0 ) description += ", photons";
00060         else if( q == 1 ) description += ", positrons";
00061         else description += ", unknown particle type";
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 extern "C" {
00067 
00068 EGS_POINT_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource* createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00069         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00070     return createSourceTemplate<EGS_PointSource>(input,f,"point source");
00071 }
00072
